title: Your mains damage type and scalings are switched
body:
Ad to Ap and vice versa true damage is still the same 


{{champion:11}} Were back {{item:3089}}

replies.body: {{champion:24}} Pretty well the same build I guess.........
{{champion:266}} Suh dude, it's me your hybrid scaling mate.
Jax mains, we take all the shit for splitting. But we do our job, I like you (How this occurred from a post about scalings changing I have no idea XD)
{{champion:45}} You get AD for every stack? A ranged Nasus, if Nasus could go Super Saiyan
{{champion:76}} {{item:1408}} {{item:3085}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3072}}{{item:3046}} {{item:3006}} Full crit feline is the way to go

They'd be on the rework list for sure lol
People already play ad malzahar and it works, if his q e and r were given ad scalings he would he really viable ad
Didn't they lower his ad scaling on his w by a lot so now it isn't that viable anymore?
Well it's still doable... but not viable, no. It's like a .01 scaling or something like that now.

{{champion:74}} AD-scaling turret dmg and hp

> [{quoted}](name=Enselus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NRMkFfnI,comment-id=0021,timestamp=2017-01-22T22:55:16.359+0000)
>
> {{champion:74}} AD-scaling turret dmg and hp

But the size of your wrench now scales with AP - so you still have to build the other type to see the hilarity of your ginormous wrenches...
I never even knew that was a thing

> [{quoted}](name=Enselus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NRMkFfnI,comment-id=002100000000,timestamp=2017-01-23T17:14:19.272+0000)
>
> I never even knew that was a thing

Build AD on heim - and watch your wrenchs grow to rediculous sizes...
{{champion:21}} Q becomes a nuke on the level of Veigar's Ultimate with Lichbane.
{{champion:45}} What's that - My ult now scales off of YOUR ad as well as my own? THE POWER - THE ABSOLUTE POWER!
{{champion:78}} : The new Galio. Nuke everything ever.
{{champion:150}}:  So that means my W will now do 100% damage off my AD every third hit on my target, and my ult is stronger now...FEAR THE TINY YORDLE.
